remarks: A deduction theorem for converting the inference ` |- F/_ x A ` => ` |- ph ` into a closed theorem.  Use ~ nfa1 and ~ nfab to eliminate the hypothesis of the substitution instance ` ps ` of the inference.  For converting the inference form into a deduction form, ~ abidnf is useful.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2006.)
statement:
dedhb.1 $e |- ( A = { z | A. x z e. A } -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dedhb.2 $e |- ps $.
dedhb $p |- ( F/_ x A -> ph ) $.
$d A z $.
$d x z $.
